ComicInfo.Title: Snake Hunt Part 7
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake Hunt Part 7: The Joes, Dreadnoks, Iron Grenaders and Oktober Guard are all converging on Springfield while Snake Eyes breaks out of his cell.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 04:02:29. [CVDB768683] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:34:59. [Issue ID 2119893]
